mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.GALLERY_COMM_NO, A.GALLERY_NO, A.COMM_CONTENT, A.COMM_STATE, A.COMM_DEPTH, A.COMM_GROUP_NO, A.COMM_DATE, A.ID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY COMM_GROUP_NO DESC, COMM_DEPTH ASC, COMM_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, GALLERY_COMM_NO, GALLERY_NO, COMM_CONTENT, COMM_STATE, COMM_DEPTH, COMM_GROUP_NO, COMM_DATE, ID FROM GALLERY_COMM WHERE GALLERY_NO = #{galleryNo}) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
